item.title: Authorization code flow
item.description: Authorization code flow In Phase 1?: “Yes, but for phase 1 we can keep all flows one guide” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: New IAM Developers,Developers new to Okta Links to original docs: Pull from below existing content: Implement authorization by grant type (Authorization code dimension): https://developer.
